item.title: I Let Copilot Refactor My App, So You Don't Have To (The Wrong Way)
item.description: I had a seemingly simple refactoring task on a sample project and I thought, "Let's get GitHub Copilot to do the heavy lifting!". What followed was a spiral into chaos that taught me a crucial lesson about using AI the smart way.
